title: State board on geographic names
context: §4E-1 State board on geographic names. There shall be in the office of planning a state board on geographic names, consisting of the following persons or their representatives: the chairperson of the board of land and natural resources, the chairperson of the office of Hawaiian affairs, the chairperson of the Hawaiian homes commission, the director of the office of planning, the president of the University of Hawaii, the state land surveyor, and the director of the Bernice P. Bishop Museum. The members of the board shall serve without compensation. Section 26-34 shall not apply to this board. [L 1974, c 50, pt of §2; am L 1987, c 336, §7; am L 1988, c 347, §1; am L 1996, c 299, §3]
